C01_Verify_user_can_search_for_weather_d.TestDataPurpose: User can search data with search string contains city name only
User can search data with search string contains city name and country code, separated by comma

C05_Verify_user_can_NOT_search_for_weath.TestDataPurpose: User can NOT search data with search string contains invalid city name
User can NOT search data with search string contains city name and country code with wrong order
User can NOT search data with search string contains city name and invalid country code, separated by comma
